title: WCAS POLI_SCI 390-0-20 Special Topics in Political Science

descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value:
Prof. Daniel Krcmaric, "International Responses to Mass Atrocities" Fall 2016
When genocides, mass killings, and war crimes occur, how should the international community respond? Students will write a paper and give a simulated policy briefing on how to respond to a specific case of mass atrocites.
